#summary Introduction page for the project

= What is ArduRCT? =

ArduRCT is a versatile solution for controlling and receiving telemetry from any remotely controlled vehicule.

http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/ArduRCT_overview.png

ArduRCT provides 2 sub-systems:
  * a local one, which can be autonomous or connected to a computer. It sends commands and displays telemetry.
  * a remote one, which can be used in replacement of any Receiver on a RC vehicule. It processes commands and sends telemetry.
